content.rendered:
THE PEARL TREND

So many great fashion trends and so little time. Happy Fall! October is such a fun month with Halloween, cosy nights in, pumpkins, and a fashionable blazer/jacket season. I have been seeing so many amazing pearl handbags this year and the pearl trend is just getting bigger and bigger. These handbags are a fun way to add some magic to your look and are perfect for the upcoming holiday party season. 

Another trend I’m seeing is the cream color trend, especially when worn from head to toe. This look from FWRD.com has the cream blazer trend, the western boot trend, and the sporty biker shorts trend all in one look. I think it looks really smart, comfortable, and fashion-forward at the same time.

So excited! My new rose gold candle special edition is here and it makes for a perfect gift for yourself or someone you love. This candle is hand poured and made with soy and coconut. Perfect as a holiday gift! D’Lashes candles are available on D’Lashes.com.

The blazer look is from FWRD.COM Pearl earnings and bags are also from FWRD.COM.

P.S. Let’s book those lash extensions appointments early during the busy holiday season! For appointments – Click Here (By Appointment Only). Shop D’Lashes Beauty and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

XO XO, DIONNE
